name: My Salad Shop Truck - Healthy Food Cooking Game
name_original: My Salad Shop Truck - Healthy Food Cooking Game
description:
Hello guys! This time we have come up with an awesome game on salads and foods. In this cooking game, you need to make a wide range of salads and food recipes to the hunger of the customers. You need to take care that all customers are served as per their requirement and make sure you don't burn any food recipe. To boost up the gameplay we have included daily challenges and daily rewards. In any level, you can use the boosters to spice up your chef gameplay experience. So what are you waiting for? Get this game right now and get addicted with delicious food recipes.

Key Features:-

- Use different cooking equipments to cook food recipes

- A wide range of food recipes to serve customers

- Different play areas in a single game

- Spice up the gameplay experience with boosters

- Unlock all the shops to explore the whole game

- Complete the target to par the level
